entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ref safety violation is not detected when property accessors have parameters with different EffectiveScope. #71798
  • Add an API to discover if a symbol is a WellKnownType that effects public API behavior #71790
  • Informational version with too many dots produces zero product version in VS_FIXEDFILEINFO Win32 version resources #71789
  • OpenProjectAsync() is failing in docker container with base image of mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:6.0 #71784

Closed

  • IDE0305 suggests changing away from dedicated ToArray method #71788
  • It is not possible to compile a switch expression that calls a method with the DoesNotReturn attribute and always throws an exception #71786
  • Nested catch rethrows the parent exception in async methods #71569
    17.10
  • Make ProgrammaticSuppressionInfo public #69000
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Recreate the get accessor when extracting an interface member #71797
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove dependency on IFindUsageContext from DefinitionItemExtensions #71795
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update NuGetAuthenticate to 1 #71791
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change WriteEvent calls to WriteEventCore #71785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce ImmutableArray allocations around AssemblyIdentity #71783
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cleanup VSIX asset inclusion #71782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial proposal for artifacts #71781
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Ban use-collection-expression in a particular case #71796
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support lexing razor comments #71697
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Handle unconverted collection expressions in nullable analysis #71792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Don't reference S.R.C.Unsafe in net7.0 or newer #71787
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Clean up the IntelliSense option pages #71777
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix rethrowing in nested async catch #71578
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disable OSX queue #71778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add native lock feature status #71769
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Expose programmatic suppressions from SuppressionInfo #71207
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use Regex source generator in compiler #71721
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use ParamCollectionAttribute to mark params collections in metadata #71747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Update our syntax list types to be "collection builder" types. #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.10
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Make postfix `for` and `forr` snippets available for types with `Length` or `Count` property #71748
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Extract factory interface for AbstractSnippetExpansionClient #71752
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Upstream changes from Vertical Build PoC #71666
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Another attempt at publishing bootstrap logs #71774
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prefer converting to ReadOnlySpan for spread optimization when we do not need to write #71733
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
